snippet.title: Cursed Places: Hotel Floor 13 | Very Challenging New Anomaly Game | PC
snippet.description:
Cursed Places: Hotel Floor 13 | Very Challenging New Anomaly Game | PC
#anomaly #pcgaming #gaming #gameplay #indiegame #newgame 

Buy Game - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2955050/Cursed_Places_Hotel_Floor_13/

You are unlucky resident of the Hotel's Cursed Floor 13. Reach 1st Floor and escape from this endless cursed loop.

- Look for Anomalies

- If you find an anomaly use Red Elevator

- If Floor has no anomalies use Green Elevator

- Reach 1st Floor to escape from Cursed Floor 13

Cursed Places: Hotel Floor 13 is a short walking simulator inspired by Exit 8. Game is available only in English.
